articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: TCS, Infy, HCL Tech among top losers as bleak outlook, muted Q2 earnings fuel crash - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Tech Mahindra ended at Rs 1,197, down 2.8 percent from the previous close on the NSE, becoming the top loser on Nifty. HCLTech fell nearly 2 percent to end the day at Rs 1,223.
articles.content: Major information technology stocks such as TCS, Infosys, HCLTech and Tech Mahindra tanked on October 12 on the back of a bleak outlook and a tepid set of numbers. The Nifty IT Index was also down ne… [+1804 chars]
